Projects.description: Airfield manager is a group based project I build during school with 3 other students to learn about sockets and real time communication between client and server. </br> We build the project using WPF forms and C#. </br> The point of the application is for planes to connect to the server and request orders. The server will then respons with commands for the client to execute.
This project is one of the biggets projects I build so far, and I had a blast programming it.
